name: Dungeon Lord!
summary: Welcome to the Dungeon! In Dungeon Lord, a single player, turn-based, fantasy card game, you take a team of adventurers into the dungeon to find fame and loot. Defeat powerful enemies and devious traps using enchanted weapons and magical spells. Featuring short, addictive gameplay, Dungeon Lord is easy to play, and hard to put down. Can you become... the Dungeon Lord?
